content: How fascinating! All this time I thought it was the <style=Highlight>Quill Pen & Astrology Book</style>. Though, as I've just learned, {A害羞挠头}it would appear that they were actually talking about my thesis...

content: Seems it has become something of a campus legend... I heard everyone finds writing their thesis painful? How strange. I actually quite enjoy writing mine~ Yeep?

content: {A心虚目移}There's been a "mysterious rumor" circulating in the Academia recently, which tells of a seemingly endless book that would get longer on its own.
